modName: Erotic sexy wet body for males and resource for females
summary: WARNING! For sex mods users! Body textures with 'sweat' on it. Males only - but I will do females if you request it :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#ffff00]It is for male only, so if you are not into that kind of stuff, move and don't hate![/color]

[color=#ffff00]It is ihghly recommanded for sex mods![/color]

[color=#ffff00]If you wish, I can create[/color][color=#00ffff] female version[/color][color=#ffff00] too - or you can make your own from the [/color][color=#00ffff]resource files[/color][color=#ffff00].[/color][/size]
[/center]


[left][size=4]What is it?
A body texture replacer for male characters - diffuse and specular maps. Your normal maps will be untouched. I've used the default textures of the body types as bases.
 It was inspired by Glorious perspiration, to give sweat a fake 3D effect. Sweat, well... it is something else, more likely. :)[/size][/left]
[size=4]Installation notes
I made a version for SoS, SAM (which I'm using), Favoredsoul erect and flaccid and for Sundracon. All of them have a diffuse and a specular map - expect SoS and SAM. You only have to choose your version and unzip the files in your Skyrim folder.

For SoS users: 
You will have to place the malegenitals textures in their folder, because I haven't added them to the folder structure - I don't remember where it was ^^'

If there is any problem, you can use only the specular map (malebody_1_s.dds), it works for all version.

Requirements:
The body of your choice and the default textures for them.[/size]
author: Lady Fiszi
